items.title: I GOT GIFTS FROM HOLOPLUS STAFF!! ğŸ¥°ğŸ™ğŸ’—ğŸâœ¨ï¸
items.body:
I was gifted goodies from holoplus staff yesterday!!ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ (I was so busy I only managed to post it now hehe)

Isn't this the viral macha in Japan?!?! It's all over my For You page!! AND IT'S CRAZY GOOD IT FELT LIKE MY CHEEKS WERE ABOUT TO MELT FROM HOW GOOD IT WAS ğŸ˜­ğŸ˜­ğŸ’ğŸ’–ğŸ’•ğŸ’“

I also got Pista & Tokyo, and if you've never tried it before then I suggest you guys to buy it when you have the chance because the pistachio sando cookies were âœ¨ï¸ETHERALâœ¨ï¸

Of course, we talked a lot about holoplus and ways to improve it! We brainstormed a lot and I really hope you guys look forward to future updates! We have a LOT of exciting features in the future ğŸ‘€ğŸ‘€ The staff are working so very hard behind the scenes, so I hope you keep supporting Holoplus ğŸ™‡â€â™‚ï¸ğŸ’•

Isn't this the viral macha in Japan?!?! It's all over my For You page!! AND IT'S CRAZY GOOD IT FELT LIKE MY CHEEKS WERE ABOUT TO MELT FROM HOW GOOD IT WAS ğŸ˜­ğŸ˜­ğŸ’ğŸ’–ğŸ’•ğŸ’“

I also got Pista & Tokyo, and if you've never tried it before then I suggest you guys to buy it when you have the chance because the pistachio sando cookies were âœ¨ï¸ETHERALâœ¨ï¸

Of course, we talked a lot about holoplus and ways to improve it! We brainstormed a lot and I really hope you guys look forward to future updates! We have a LOT of exciting features in the future ğŸ‘€ğŸ‘€ The staff are working so very hard behind the scenes, so I hope you keep supporting Holoplus ğŸ™‡â€â™‚ï¸ğŸ’•

id.title: AKU DAPAT HADIAH DARI STAFF HOLOPLUS!! ğŸ¥°ğŸ™ğŸ’—ğŸâœ¨ï¸
id.body:
Aku dapat hadiah barang-barang keren dari staff holoplus kemarin!!ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ (Aku sibuk banget jadi baru bisa posting sekarang hehe)

Ini matcha viral di Jepang bukan sih?!?! Muncul terus di halaman "Untukmu" ku!! DAN RASANYA LUAR BIASA ENAK SAMPAI KUPINGKU RASANYA MAU MELELEH KARENA ENAK BANGET ğŸ˜­ğŸ˜­ğŸ’ğŸ’–ğŸ’•ğŸ’“

Aku juga dapat Pista & Tokyo, dan kalau kalian belum pernah coba, aku saranin kalian beli kalau ada kesempatan karena cookies sando pistachio-nya itu âœ¨ï¸LUAR BIASAâœ¨ï¸

Tentu saja, kami banyak bicara tentang holoplus dan cara memperbaikinya! Kami bertukar pikiran banyak dan aku sangat berharap kalian menantikan pembaruan di masa mendatang! Kami punya BANYAK fitur menarik di masa depan ğŸ‘€ğŸ‘€ Para staff bekerja sangat keras di balik layar, jadi aku harap kalian terus mendukung Holoplus ğŸ™‡â€â™‚ï¸ğŸ’•

items.title: THE LIKE BUTTON IS SO ODDLY SATISFYING... ğŸ˜³ğŸ˜³
items.body:
The staff never told me to say this (like seriously this is a non-advertisement post) but like...

Don't you just get satisfaction after hitting 100 likes?? It feels rewarding, validating, I could go all day hitting these likes I swear
